Title: Welcome
Body:
Welcome to your Open Berkeley Jumpstart site.

Placeholder content has been included in this Jumpstart site to facilitate getting started.

Review the following training guides for more information

  • Planning your website
  • Open Berkeley Editors Guide
  • Open Berkeley Site Builders Guide

For questions, contact IST Drupal.

Title: Credits
Body:
• This website was created by departmental managers and staff.
  • Branding identity and design from University Relations Development Communications.
  • Photos are courtesy of UC Berkeley University Relations and Tom Holdford.
  • All material is copyrighted to UC Regents.

Our website uses Open Berkeley, a custom content management solution built with Drupal and hosted on Pantheon. The Open Berkeley initiative is sponsored by Vice Chancellor John Wilton and Associate Chancellor Linda Williams. Built by central IT developers, with brand identity and design from University Relations Development Communications, Open Berkeley allows departments to cost-effectively build, manage, and maintain campus websites using a standardized, open-source solution with a UC Berkeley signature.

Please contact us if you have questions or feedback about this website. If you are interested in deploying this system in your department, contact IST Drupal.
